project.name: J-C089D-LENY-05-ST03-DT01-DF07-CF06-01
project.description: This test creates a connection to the PGSQL database, and creates a query string based on data in an environment variable. This data is not checked for special elements, however, and it is possible to construct a query string that performs unexpected data retrievals or modifications.
project.run_command: env LENYA_HOME="$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL" LENYA_WEBAPP_HOME="$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp" JETTY_PORT="8888" JETTY_ADMIN_PORT="8889" java $SS_JAVA_OPTS -Djava.library.path=$SS_TC_DEPS/lib64/ -Xms32M -Xmx512M -Djava.awt.headless=true -cp "$SS_JAVA_CLASSPATH" -Djava.endorsed.dirs=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/endorsed -Dorg.xml.sax.parser=org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser -Djetty.port=8888 -Dloader.jar.repositories=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/lib:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/lib:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/ext:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/ext:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/resources:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/endorsed -Dwebapp=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp -Dhome=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL -Dorg.mortbay.util.URI.charset=ISO-8859-1 -Dloader.main.class=org.mortbay.jetty.plus.Server Loader $SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/conf/main.xml

iopair.name: J-C089D-LENY-05-ST03-DT01-DF07-CF06-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: open firefox and browse to default page Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="shipper1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="BadShipper'), ('80', 'BadShipper2" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_qTSDcnUS1yWy0ryHpbjd AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_cEy2CmCB58 OR db_sql_output_ptE1KehZxg OR database_insert_check_wG9TaBMPcH) AND NOT timeout_KiIW5Kpo8K) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_cEy2CmCB58 OR db_sql_output_ptE1KehZxg OR database_insert_check_wG9TaBMPcH) OR timeout_KiIW5Kpo8K OR controlled_exit_2PmPAItWJu)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_cEy2CmCB58 OR db_sql_output_ptE1KehZxg OR database_insert_check_wG9TaBMPcH) AND NOT timeout_KiIW5Kpo8K) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_cEy2CmCB58 OR db_sql_output_ptE1KehZxg OR database_insert_check_wG9TaBMPcH) OR timeout_KiIW5Kpo8K OR controlled_exit_2PmPAItWJu))

output_checks.simple_check: export PGPASSWORD=$DBPGPASSWORD; if `psql -U $DBPGUSER -h $DBPGHOST -d $SS_DBPGDATABASE -c "select * from shippers;" | grep -q "BadShipper2\|ShipAttack"`; then true; else false; fi;

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="ShippersRUs'), ('55', 'BadShips'), ('65', 'ShipAttack'), ('45', 'MultiShip" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_LaDEru1MWJlg6DqJeo0O AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_Z0mb7ogoSp OR db_sql_output_H0nmF3jTuZ OR database_insert_check_sWQqcwOp3V) AND NOT timeout_h2XJXsbWTh) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_Z0mb7ogoSp OR db_sql_output_H0nmF3jTuZ OR database_insert_check_sWQqcwOp3V) OR timeout_h2XJXsbWTh OR controlled_exit_S9mxCfIgxR)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_Z0mb7ogoSp OR db_sql_output_H0nmF3jTuZ OR database_insert_check_sWQqcwOp3V) AND NOT timeout_h2XJXsbWTh) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_Z0mb7ogoSp OR db_sql_output_H0nmF3jTuZ OR database_insert_check_sWQqcwOp3V) OR timeout_h2XJXsbWTh OR controlled_exit_S9mxCfIgxR))

output_checks.simple_check: export PGPASSWORD=$DBPGPASSWORD; if `psql -U $DBPGUSER -h $DBPGHOST -d $SS_DBPGDATABASE -c "select * from shippers;" | grep -q "BadShipper2\|ShipAttack"`; then true; else false; fi;
